node.excerpt: Late last year, at work they were looking for people to train up and get certified on working with Drupal so we could bid for jobs working with it. I can't say I'm a big fan of…
I maintain a custom PHP legacy CMS for a client, and have also been building a micro-CMS as a learning project, so I've spent quite a lot of time in the last few years thinking…

frontmatter.title: What I want in a PHP CMS
